Package org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.widget

Annotation Interface NumberInputWidget

@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(FIELD) public @interface NumberInputWidget
Annotate a number setting with this in order to provide validation instructions.
Author:

    Provides a double value given the context of the node.

  • Element Details

    • min

      double min
      Use minProvider() if the minimum value depends on the context of the node.
      Returns:
      an optional minimum value for a numeric field
      Default:
      0.0/0.0

    • minProvider

      Class<? extends NumberInputWidget.DoubleProvider> minProvider
      Takes precedence over min() if provided. No minimum is set if the DoubleProvider returns Double.NaN.
      Returns:
      an optional DoubleProvider that provides the min value given the current context of the node
      Default:
      org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.widget.NumberInputWidget.DoubleProvider.class

    • max

      double max
      Use maxProvider() if the maximum value depends on the context of the node.
      Returns:
      an optional maximum value for a numeric field
      Default:
      0.0/0.0

    • maxProvider

      Class<? extends NumberInputWidget.DoubleProvider> maxProvider
      Takes precedence over max() if provided. No maximum is set if the DoubleProvider returns Double.NaN.
      Returns:
      an optional DoubleProvider that provides the max value given the current context of the node
      Default:
      org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.widget.NumberInputWidget.DoubleProvider.class
